actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to clarify the deductability under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 of liabilities incurred in connection with minimum premium plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with regard to insurance company taxable income, to treat as unearned premiums any termination reserves under minimum premium plans (thus providing that amounts reflected as reserves or other liabilities on a property and casualty insurance company's annual statement for future claim payments under minimum premium accident and health plans are properly deductible during the policy period).

titles.title: A bill to clarify the deductability under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 of liabilities incurred in connection with minimum premium plans.
